articles.title: National Meeting Marks 105th Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 105th Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Friday to celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Attending it was Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, delegates to the celebrations, officials of party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions and industrial establishments in the city, those related to revolutionary activities of the great leaders, those who had the honor of being received by the great leaders, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, working people, overseas compatriots' congratulatory groups and delegations and other overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Invited to it were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and military attaches of foreign embassies here and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that April 15, Juche 1 (1912) when President Kim Il Sung was born, was the day of the greatest fortune in the history of the Korean nation and a great revolutionary auspicious day when the Korean nation greeted a peerlessly great man.
					
					 Saying that the President is the peerlessly great man who steered the extremely arduous and trying Korean revolution, providing the treasures of eternal value for ever-lasting victory and prosperity of Juche Korea, the reporter referred to the revolutionary career and exploits of the President. 
					
					 The reporter went on:
					
					 Born into the Mangyongdae family, revolutionary and patriotic down through generations, the President embarked upon the road of the revolution in his teens with the great intention to save the destiny of the country and the nation.
					
					 He clarified the principle of Juche that a revolution should be carried out by the strength of the people to suit the actual conditions of their country and the principle of the Songun revolution that strong armed forces guarantee independence of the nation and the victory of the revolution, and fathered the immortal Juche idea, the Songun idea.
					
					 From the firm stand of Juche, he comprehensively clarified the theoretical and practical problems at various stages of the revolutionary struggle and in all the fields and sectors of socialist construction.
					
					 He defeated the Japanese imperialists under the worst conditions where there were neither state rear nor backing from regular armed forces to achieve the historic cause of liberating the country. He victoriously led the grim Fatherland Liberation War, which could be called confrontation between rifle and A-bomb.
					
					 He successfully carried out the historic cause of founding the party, state and army and developed them into the powerful political weapons for socialist construction as required by the developing revolution.
					
					 Regarding the national reunification as the greatest patriotic cause and the supreme task of the nation, he had devoted his all to the work for independent reunification of the country until the last moments of his revolutionary life.
					
					 Through his energetic external activities, he remarkably raised the international position and influence of the DPRK and boosted its foreign relations and sincerely helped peoples of different countries struggling for independence and socialism against imperialism and steered the struggle for accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 His greatest feat is that he successfully settled the issue of succession to the revolutionary cause to provide a sure guarantee for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Mt Paektu started by the President had made a steady advance thanks to leader Kim Jong Il and now it is greeting a fresh historic turning phase under the stewardship of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the reporter stressed.
					
					 The reporter called for advancing the Korean revolution on a higher stage and accomplishing the socialist cause with the idea and exploits of Kim Il Sung as an eternal cornerstone.
					
					 Similar meetings took place in all provinces, cities, counties and at complexes on the same day.

articles.title: U.S. Provocative Option Will Meet Toughest Counteraction of DPRK: KPA General Staff
articles.content:
U.S. Provocative Option Will Meet Toughest Counteraction of DPRK: KPA General Staff
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA) issued a statement Friday as regards the extremely dangerous situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the Trump administration's reckless military provocation.
					 The Trump administration of the U.S. began to disclose its brigandish nature timed to coincide with Key Resolve and Foal Eagle nuclear war games now under way in across south Korea, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK policy shaped by the Trump administration is first to put high-intensity sanctions and pressure together with someone, second to constantly keep tactical nuclear weapons deployed in south Korea and third to launch an independent military action aimed at "beheading operation" against the leadership of the DPRK and "preemptive strike".
					
					 In actuality, the Trump administration, which made a surprise cruise guided missile strike at Syria on April 6, has entered the path of open threat and blackmail against the DPRK, describing it as "a strong warning message" to it.
					
					 The U.S. State secretary, Defense secretary and other officials concerned with security of the U.S. are openly crying out more often than not for launching an independent military action against the DPRK.
					
					 Under the prevailing situation where the Trump administration's serious military hysteria has reached a dangerous phase which can no longer be overlooked, the KPA General Staff re-clarifies its principled stand as follows upon authorization:
					
					 1. All the brigandish provocative moves of the U.S. in the political, economic and military fields pursuant to its hostile policy toward the DPRK will thoroughly be foiled through the toughest counteraction of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					2. Our toughest counteraction against the U.S. and its vassal forces will be taken in such a merciless manner as not to allow the aggressors to survive.
					
					3. Under the prevailing grave situation, the U.S. has to come to its senses and make a proper option for the solution of the problem.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will as ever courageously counter those who encroach upon the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and will always mercilessly foil all the provocative options of the U.S. with Korean-style toughest counteraction.

articles.title: Spokesman for Korean Jurists Committee Hits out at U.S. Missile Attack on Syria
articles.content:
Spokesman for Korean Jurists Committee Hits out at U.S. Missile Attack on Syria
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. should be punished according to international law as its military attack on Syria was an undisguised act of aggression and war crime, says a spokesman for the Korean Jurists Committee in a statement on Friday.
					 Recalling that the U.S. attacked an airbase of the army of the Syrian government with dozens of cruise missiles on March 7 under the absurd pretext of the Syrian army's use of chemical weapons, the statement says:
					
					 This act should never be pardoned as it runs counter to the UN General Assembly resolution on definition of aggression and Paris Treaty on war renouncement and constitutes an act of aggression and a war crime definitely specified by the Nuremberg Military Tribunal.
					
					 It is the U.S. which is most loud-mouthed about "implementation of resolutions" since it initiated and signed the treaty on war renouncement before anyone else.
					
					 But the U.S. used aggression and war as a lever for carrying out its policy in disregard of international law. It made missile attacks on the countries incurring its disfavor in wanton violation of their sovereignty.
					
					 The international community should never tolerate the U.S. attack on Syria but mete out a due punishment to the harasser of peace.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Heads of Delegations and Delegates of Juche Idea Study Groups
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Heads of Delegations and Delegates of Juche Idea Study Groups
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with heads of delegations and delegates of Juche idea study groups, including Director-General Ramon Jimenez Lopez and Secretary General Kenichi Ogami of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
					 They are visiting the DPRK to celebrate the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Islamic Coalition Party of Iran
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Islamic Coalition Party of Iran
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun.
					The gift was handed to Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, by First Vice-General Secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran Seyed Mehdi Joulaee who is heading a delegation of the party, on a visit to the DPRK, Friday.

articles.title: Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Marks Day of Sun
articles.content:
Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Marks Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations took place here on Friday to celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It was attended by the delegates of the KCU organizations from each province and schoolchildren here, and pupils to join the KCU.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials concerned, officials of the youth league, war veterans and persons of merit.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., the youth league, in his report recalled that Kim Il Sung who provided the tradition of the Juche-oriented children's movement in the flames of the anti-Japanese struggle founded the KCU after the liberation of the country and brought up the rising generation as reliable successors to the Juche revolution.
					
					 The history of his love for them had been given a steady continuity by leader Kim Jong Il while providing Songun revolutionary leadership, the reporter said, adding:
					
					 Thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who translates the great leaders' noble intention of showing love for the younger generation and future into stirring realities, the song "We Are the Happiest in the World" is resounding far and wide on this land.
					
					 The reporter called on the members of the KCU to register successes in study and organizational life, socio-political activities and good-conduct movement.
					
					 Then followed a KCU admission ceremony.
					
					 The pupils joining the KCU took an oath, led by Choe Ryong Hae.
					
					 Officials, war veterans and persons of merit put red ties around the necks of the pupils and pinned KCU badges on their dresses.
					
					 The new KCU members made the first salute of the KCU members, responding to the slogan "Let us be always ready for socialist country!"
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made at the meeting.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Iranian Political Party Delegation
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Iranian Political Party Delegation 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Friday met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran led by First Vice-General Secretary Seyed Mehdi Joulaee on a visit to the DPRK to mark the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Italian Personage
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Italian Personage
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy, and his party on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is chairman of the Foreign Affairs Commission of the Supreme People's Assembly, by the secretary general on Friday.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets with Mexican Party Delegation
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets with Mexican Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, Politburo member and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Friday had a talk with a delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico (WPM) led by Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the WPM, on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Reception Given for Mexican Party Delegation
articles.content:
Reception Given for Mexican Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Friday gave a reception in honor of a delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico headed by National Leader Alberto Anaya Gutierrez.
					
					 Ri Su Yong, Politburo member and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Vice Department Director Ryu Myong Son and other officials of the C.C., WPK were on hand.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Workers' Party of Mexico
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Workers' Party of Mexico
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Workers' Party of Mexico (WPM) on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The gift was conveyed to Ri Su Yong, Politburo member and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Friday by Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the WPM, who is heading a delegation of the WPM on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Mexican Party Delegation Here
articles.content:
Mexican Party Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico led by National Leader Alberto Anaya Gutierrez arrived here Friday to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Italian Guests

Ri Su Yong Meets Italian Guests
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, Politburo member and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, who is chairman of the Diplomatic Commission of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday met Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy, and his party on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the United Socialist Nationalist Party of Nepal, a delegation of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party and Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy, and his party on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of the President, on Friday.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President at his old home in Mangyongdae, they looked round the historical mementoes.
					
					 They also visited the Korean Revolution Museum on the same day.

articles.title: Korean Cultural Exhibition Opens in China
articles.content:
Korean Cultural Exhibition Opens in China
 Dandong, April 14 (KCNA-Correspondent) -- The DPRK's cultural exhibition was opened with due ceremony in Dandong, China on Friday to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Depicted at the DPRK-China Cultural Exhibition is the old home in Mangyongdae where Kim Il Sung was born, and a large poster bearing the flags of the DPRK and China is standing there.
					
					 On display at the venue of the exhibition are photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the personality of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as a great man.
					
					 Also displayed there are their works, Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias, flowers of the sun, books, pictures and stamps introducing the picture of the DPRK and the history and cultural traditions of Korea and art pieces showing the creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony of the exhibition were Pak Myong Ho, charge d'affaires ad interim of the DPRK embassy in Beijing, and his embassy members, a DPRK's delegation of the cultural exhibition for celebrating the Day of the Sun led by Vice-Minister of Culture Ri Sun Chol, Koreans in China, the deputy director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Liaoning Provincial People's Government of China, the deputy mayor of the Dandong City People's Government and other Chinese personages and citizens.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the photos of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Ri Sun Chol said in an opening speech that the exploits performed by the President in laying the eternal foundations for accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution will shine forever.
					
					 Ri referred to the history and tradition of the friendship between the DPRK and China provided by Kim Il Sung together with the elder leaders of China.
					
					 He noted that the exhibition would offer a good occasion to make visitors know better about exploits of the great leaders and the personality of Kim Jong Un as a great man.
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made there.
					
					 After looking round the exhibition, Chinese personages hoped that the exhibition would contribute to developing the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two peoples.
					
					 The exhibition goes on till April 17.

articles.title: Reception Given for Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Groups
articles.content:
Reception Given for Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Groups
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Social Scientists Society of Korea gave a reception at the Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Friday in honor of the delegations and delegates of Juche idea study groups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Director-General Ramon Jimenez Lopez and Secretary General Kenichi Ogami of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and their companions and other delegations and delegates.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education who is chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, and officials concerned.

articles.title: DPRK Order and Medal Conferred on Juche Idea Followers
articles.content:
DPRK Order and Medal Conferred on Juche Idea Followers
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK order and medal were conferred on Juche idea followers of different countries with due ceremony at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					 Order of DPRK Friendship 2nd Class was awarded to Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and Masaji Ie, co-representative of the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, and friendship medal on seven others.
					
					 They have made positive contributions to the work for the cause of human independence through energetic activities for the study and dissemination of the Juche idea.

articles.title: IIJI Secretary General and His Party Visit Statues of Great Leaders
articles.content:
IIJI Secretary General and His Party Visit Statues of Great Leaders
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party Friday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The guests laid a floral basket before the statues and paid tribute to the great leaders.
					
					 Meanwhile, a floral basket from Jindallae Saphariny, president of the Jindallae Children's Foundation, was laid at the statues on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Equatorial Guinean President Obiang Nguema Mbasogo sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung.
					 The floral basket was laid at the statues of the great leaders on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Kyoto Delegation of Japan
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Kyoto Delegation of Japan
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the Kyoto delegation of Japan for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The floral basket was handed to an official concerned by Tsutomu Yasui, vice-chairperson of the Japan-DPRK Friendship Kyoto Net for the Promotion of Cultural, Scientific and Civic Exchange, Friday.

articles.title: Delegation of Officials of Chongryon Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Officials of Chongryon Arrives
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) headed by Song Tong Hwi, vice-director of its Central Standing Committee, arrived here on Friday to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Families of Those Related to Anti-Japanese War Here
articles.content:
Families of Those Related to Anti-Japanese War Here

T. Nobichenko, an internationalist soldier, arrived here Friday to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Delegation of Association for Studying Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Amur Region, Russia Here

Delegation of Association for Studying Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Amur Region, Russia Here
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Association for Studying Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Amur Region, Russia led by Chairman Aleksei Donchenko Blagoveshensk arrived here Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and overseas Koreans visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday on the occasion of the 105th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung.
					 They included a Kyoto delegation of Japan and a delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Suk from Russian Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Suk from Russian Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war heroine, received a gift from the delegation of the Kim Jong Suk Women's Union of Russia on a visit to the DPRK to celebrate the Day of the Sun.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on Friday by Chairwoman Elena Bavichi who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Floral Baskets, Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Juche Idea Followers
articles.content:
Floral Baskets, Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Juche Idea Followers
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) and his party and the delegation of the Japanese Society for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and gifts from the director-general and the secretary general of IIJI, the director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, delegations of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Kim Jong Suk Women's Union of Russia, the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in the Southern Region of Switzerland and the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India and the chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics.
					 They are visiting the DPRK to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 The floral baskets and gifts were handed to an official concerned on Friday.
					
					 Meanwhile, a gift in the joint name of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK to Kim Jong Un were conveyed on the same day.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued new stamps (one sheet and one individual) on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					  Seen in the sheet are statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill with background of the successfully remodeled Korean Revolution Museum.
					
					 There is a circle stamp which has letters "Kimilsungia, immortal flower" in its upper part and Kimilsungia in full bloom in its center.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un Friday received floral baskets from organizations of different countries on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The organizations included the Japanese preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange, the Shigoku Liaison Society for Japan-Korea Friendship, the Hiroshima Prefectural People's Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and the Korean Friendship Association.
					
					 He also received a floral basket from the family of Sin Kanemaru, former vice-prime minister of Japan, on the same day.

articles.title: Children's Camp in Kangwon Province Remodeled
articles.content:
Children's Camp in Kangwon Province Remodeled
Munchon, April 14 (KCNA) -- December 6 Children's Camp in Kangwon Province was successfully remodeled.
					 The camp houses a room dedicated to education in Kim Jong Il's patriotism, two blocks of camping centers and all other things necessary for camping life, including mess hall, bathing beach, meeting hall, gymnasium, and playing ground.
					
					 Its inaugural ceremony took place on Friday.

articles.title: Vol. 11 of "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" off Press
articles.content:
Vol. 11 of "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" off Press 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Volume 11 of "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes", a cycle of revolutionary anecdotes, was published by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House.
					 The four-chapter book carries revolutionary anecdotes left by President Kim Il Sung in the period from September Juche 37 (1948) to July Juche 38 (1949) when he was organizing and leading the work to consolidate the foundation of the self-supporting national economy and develop the Korean People's Army into an invincible army right after the birth of the Republic.
					
					 Chapter 41 "Consolidating the Republic as firm as an iron rock" deals with the selfless dedication made by the President to rally the broad masses right after the establishment of the DPRK government.
					
					 Chapter 42 "For fulfillment of the two-year plan for national economy!(1)" deals with anecdotes telling about the devoted efforts made by the President who energetically led the struggle to arouse all the people to carrying out the two-year plan for the national economy which set it as its priority task to do away with the colonial one-sidedness of the economy, the after-effect of the harsh rule of the Japanese imperialists, and lay a foundation for the self-supporting national economy.
					
					 Chapter 43 "For fulfillment of the two-year plan for national economy!(2)" conveys stories telling about the personality of the President as a great man who devoted himself to bringing joy and happiness to the people.
					
					 Chapter 44 "To guarantee prosperity of Republic with arms" carries stories dealing with the matchless pluck, courage and outstanding commanding art of the illustrious commander of Mt Paektu who resolutely foiled the reckless war moves of the U.S. imperialists and the Syngman Rhee puppet clique aimed to stifle the young DPRK.

articles.title: Moranbong Garment Manufactory
articles.content:
Moranbong Garment Manufactory
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Moranbong Garment Manufactory in the DPRK is well-known across the country for producing various uniforms with specific characters.
					 It is not long since the manufactory was inaugurated, but it gets famed for having produced peculiar uniforms suitable for the duties of public service workers at scores of units, including Terminal of Pyongyang International Airport, the general service ship Mujigae, Yanggakdo International Hotel, Hyangmanru Restaurant and Meari Shooting Gallery.
					
					 Its uniforms give a glimpse of high technical skill of tailors and their forward-looking discernment.
					
					 All the uniforms produced by the manufactory have been highly appreciated for fitting well to and refining wearers.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Eternal Sun of Humankind
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Eternal Sun of Humankind
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung is the most prominent great man in the 20th century and eternal sun of humankind, who was possessed of unparalleled broad magnanimity.
					 That's why everyone who met the President respected him as his or her teacher and elder statesman of the world.
					
					 It can be well proved by a merely fact that many figures and media of the world highly praised the President during his visit to Yugoslavia in the 1980s.
					
					 At that time, over 40 heads of state and government, some 200 delegations and political and public figures of different countries visited Yugoslavia as it had been influential in the non-aligned movement (NAM). But who attracted the universal attention was the President.
					
					 The French paper Le Monde reported that the arrival of President Kim Il Sung, active supporter of the NAM, drew special attention and the New York Times edited the image of the President ahead of photos on the arrival of other heads of state in Yugoslavia. And the Yugoslavian leadership held a central seat for the President in functions attended by many heads of state of the East and the West.
					
					 After receiving the news, a Japanese correspondent said with deep emotion that the President's visit to Yugoslavia caused a great sensation in the world, it was a really marvelous event and he is a great man and the pride of Asia.
					
					 The executive secretary of the Presidium of the Central Committee of the then League of Communists of Yugoslavia said in admiration that it came as a shock to him to see many heads of state lining themselves to meet President Kim Il Sung and it made him keenly feel the President was a great leader enjoying boundless respect from all people.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Behave with Discretion
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Behave with Discretion
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a congratulatory message to the Syrian president on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party. This encouraged the world progressives in their efforts to defend the sovereignty and territorial integrity of their countries whereas it dealt a telling blow at the reactionaries of history.
					 VOA, Google News, the New York Times and various other media and analysts of the U.S. commented that the message, sent by the Supreme Leader of the DPRK to the Syrian president at a time when there is wide-spread public view that U.S. forces' strike at Syria serves as an act of "warning" against north Korea, was a frontal rebuff at the Trump administration that trumpets about threat and warning to the DPRK, and an expression of its will to resolutely stand against the U.S.
					
					 As already known, the Trump administration mounted massive attack on an air-force base of the Syrian government army with 59 Tomahawk cruise missiles, charging that the Syrian government army "used chemical weapons to massacre civilians". 
					
					 The recent missile attack of the U.S. was an open violation of sovereignty and state-sponsored terrorism aimed to weaken and overturn the anti-imperialist Syrian government.
					
					 The world takes note of the fact that the recent military action against Syria reminds one of the situation in 2003 when the U.S. launched a military campaign against Iraq under the pretext of "weapons of mass destruction" and thus led the country to a collapse and escalated the threat of international terrorism.
					
					 The U.S. is still hatching endless plots and perpetrating provocations aimed at overturning the government of Syria in its several regions including the suburbs south of Damascus under the pretext of "chemical weapons".
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that some describe the U.S. military attack on Syria as sort of "warning" to the DPRK.
					
					 They are mistaken. The DPRK will never be taken aback by such warning.
					
					 The recent Syrian incident teaches the bitter lesson that any illusion about the imperialists is taboo, and that one can defend oneself from the imperialists' aggression only when one builds one's own strength.
					
					 The present situation clearly proves that strength should be countered in kind and the DPRK was quite right when it opted for drastically bolstering up its nuclear force.
					
					 Neither nuclear threat nor economic sanctions can ever check the dynamic advance of the army and people of the DPRK determined to foil the U.S. moves to stifle it, and certainly build a powerful socialist country under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is the invariable stand of the DPRK to bolster its military capabilities for self-defence in every way and defend the security of the country, the nation and the region with its own strength to cope with the U.S. evermore undisguised nuclear war moves.
					
					 The Trump administration had better stop going reckless, bearing deep in mind that it is in its supreme interests to face up to the strategic position of the DPRK and the trend of the times and behave with prudence and self-control.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition of Chongryon Held
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition of Chongryon Held 
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo from April 11 to 14 in celebration of the fifth anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the party and state.
					 On display in the venue of the exhibition were photos on the noble traits of Kim Jong Un and other photos showing stirring reality of the motherland leaping forward toward the eminence of a socialist power.
					
					 Going round the venue of the exhibition were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon; Nam Sung U and Pae Ik Ju, its vice-chairmen; Pae Jin Gu, its vice-chairman and concurrently director general of the General Affairs Department; O Min Hak, its vice-chairman and director of the Economic Affairs Department; Kang Chu Ryon, its vice-chairwoman and chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan; Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon; department directors of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the permanent adviser and the director of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, leading officials of the organizations and business groups, chairpersons of the Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area and other officials of Chongryon organizations.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Brazil
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Brazil
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed on April 6.
					 Emilia Fernandes, chairperson of the Brazilian branch of the Women Forum of the Southern Common Market, was elected chairperson of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including celebration meeting, film show and book and photo exhibition in praise of the revolutionary career and feats of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Peruvian Meeting Marks Day of Sun
articles.content:
Peruvian Meeting Marks Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian meeting was held in Lima on April 7 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were the chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru who is co-chairman of the American Regional Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland) who is chairman of the Peruvian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, the secretary general of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the president of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for the Study of Juche Songun Policy, the secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, an executive member of the Peruvian General Federation of Workers who is general secretary of the port trade union and other personages of political parties, social organizations and institutions and citizens of Peru and the ambassador and staff members 
					
					 of the D
					
					 PRK embassy in Lima.
					
					 The chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students and other speakers said that they are looking back with deep emotion on the noble life of President Kim Il Sung who is always alive in the mind of the Korean people and the world progressives on the occasion of his 105th birth anniversary.
					
					 They stressed that he was the great leader and tender-hearted father of the Korean people and a peerless statesman deeply revered by the world people.

articles.title: DPRK Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibition opened at the Art Gallery in Komsomolsk-na-Amure City of Russia on April 5 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display in the venue of the exhibition were photos of revolutionary career and feats of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and pictures showing the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed were works of great men born of Heaven of Mt Paektu and publications on the advantages of the people-centered Korean-style socialist system and its development, handicrafts showing the wisdom and talents of the Korean people, etc.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were the mayor of the Komsomolsk-na-Amure City and other figures of the city administration, staff members of the art gallery, citizens from all walks of life, presspersons and the vice-consul general and consuls in Khabarovsk.
					
					 Then speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 The mayor said that he was pleased that there took place such an exhibition on the occasion of the 105th birth anniversary of the President, the great leader of the Korean people, adding:
					
					 The President is the world-famous statesman who is recognized by the world.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's visit to the city in the year of 2002 was a historic occasion that powerfully propelled the development of the long-standing friendly relations between Russia and the DPRK.
					
					 The traces left by him in the city will always be remembered.
					
					 I am convinced that the exhibition will offer the citizens a good opportunity for learning more about the time-honored cultural traditions of the nation, creative talents of the Korean people and the reality of developing DPRK.
					
					 I hope that such a good exhibition will take place in the future, too.
					
					 The event will continue until April 22.

articles.title: Kimilsungia, Korean Book, Photo Exhibition Opens in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kimilsungia, Korean Book, Photo Exhibition Opens in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A Kimilsungia and Korean book and photo exhibition opened with due ceremony in Jakarta of Indonesia on April 6 to mark the 52nd anniversary of Indonesia visit by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the 52nd anniversary of the birth of Kimilsungia.
					 Displayed at its venue were photos of President Kim Il Sung and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display at the exhibition, which presented spectacular scenery with over 500 potted Kimilsungias, were works of the great leaders, books introducing Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia and photos showing the successes made by the Korean people in the building of a socialist power.
					
					 Present at the opening-ceremony were the general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, the chancellor of Bungkarno University of Indonesia, other personages of various strata and masses of Indonesia, the DPRK ambassador to Indonesia and his embassy officials.
					
					 The general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said that April when the President was born is a very significant month when Kimilsungia was named, adding:
					
					 When Kim Il Sung visited Indonesia 52 years ago, President Sukarno told him that he was going to name a rare flower bred by a horticulturist after his august name.
					
					 Since then the flower became not only a token of special relations between the two Presidents but a symbol of friendship between the two countries.
					
					 We will as ever further boost the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries along with the flower in full bloom by informing the new generations of the stories related to the immortal flower.
					
					 The exhibition will go on till April 16.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Arrive

articles.title: Gift to Kim Il Sung from Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Il Sung from Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung received a gift in the joint name of the Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Swiss Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the 105th Birth Anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					 The gift was handed to an official of the DPRK mission in Switzerland by Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, on April 8 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of the President.

articles.title: Efectuado acto central por 105o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Efectuado acto central por 105o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 14 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el acto central por el 105o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					En el acto participo Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los delegados invitados a los actos de celebracion, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de instituciones, fabricas y empresas en esta capital, las personas que tienen relaciones con el Presidente o fueron recibidas por el, los familiares de los martires revolucionarios, los trabajadores, el grupo de felicitacion de los coreanos residentes en ultramar, las delegaciones de los coreanos residentes en otros paises, los compatriotas en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los agregados militares, acreditados en Corea y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El informante subrayo que el 15 de abril de 1 (1912) de la Era Juche, dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, es el dia de gran fortuna sin precedente en la historia de la nacion coreana y el de gran evento revolucionario en que el pueblo coreano acogio al gran Hombre sin par.
					
					Elogio al Presidente como el gran hombre sin igual quien preparo los bienes eternos para la victoria y la prosperidad de la Corea del Juche al dirigir la revolucion coreana llena de las pruebas sin precedentes, y recordo la vida revolucionaria y hazanas del Presidente.
					
					Nacido en la familia de Mangyongdae revolucionaria y patriotica de generacion en generacion, el Presidente emprendio a la tierna edad de diez anos y pico el camino de la revolucion con el gran proposito de salvar el destino del pais y la nacion, destaco y prosiguio:
					
					El Presidente concibio la inmortal idea Juche, la de Songun, tras aclarar los principios del Juche de que la revolucion debe ser realizada conforme a la realidad de su pais basandose en las fuerzas del pueblo y los de la revolucion del Songun de que las fuerzas armadas poderosas garantizan la soberania y la independencia de la nacion y la victoria de la revolucion. 
					
					A partir de la firme posicion autoctona, dio claras respuestas a los problemas teorico-practicos que se presentan en todas las etapas de la lucha revolucionaria y en todos los dominios de la construccion socialista.
					
					Sin la retaguardia estatal ni el apoyo de las fuerzas armadas regulares logro la causa historica de la liberacion de la patria rechazando al imperialismo japones y condujo a la victoria la enconada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, confrontacion entre el fusil y la bomba atomica.
					
					Cumplio con exito la causa historica de construccion del partido, el Estado y el ejercito y fortalecio y desarrollo el Partido, el Estado y el ejercito como las poderosas armas politicas de la construccion socialista conforme a la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo.
					
					Considerando la reunificacion del pais como maxima causa patriotica y suprema tarea nacional, hizo todo lo posible para lograrla hasta el ultimo periodo de su vida revolucionaria. 
					
					Con sus energicas actividades exteriores, elevo extraordinariamente la posicion e influencias de la RPDC en la arena internacional, amplio y desarrollo las relaciones exteriores, ayudo con sinceridad a los pueblos de varios paises que luchaban por la independencia antiimperialista y el socialismo y condujo al frente el cumplimiento de la causa de independencia de la humanidad. 
					
					La proeza mas notable del Presidente es haber preparado la garantia para llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche al resolver perfectamente el problema de sucesion de la misma empresa. 
					
					La causa revolucionaria del Paektu iniciada por el tuvo firme continuidad gracias al Dirigente Kim Jong Il y acoge hoy dia el nuevo periodo de viraje historico bajo la guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Hay que llevar a la etapa mas elevada la revolucion coreana y cumplir sin falta la causa socialista tomando la idea y proezas de Kim Il Sung como eterna piedra angular.
					
					El mismo dia, se realizaron actos similares en todas las provincias, ciudades, distritos y complejos industriales.

articles.title: EMG de EPC expone posicion sobre todas las opciones provocativas de EE.UU.
articles.content:
EMG de EPC expone posicion sobre todas las opciones provocativas de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- El vocero del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 14 una declaracion en relacion con que se crea en la Peninsula Coreana una situacion extremadamente grave debido al fanatismo por la provocacion militar de la administracion Trump.
					Este ejecutivo comenzo a exponer su fachada de gangster coincidiendo con los ejercicios de guerra nuclear Key Resolve y Foal Eagle que se desarrollan ahora en toda la extension geografica surcoreana, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					Se dice que la politica sobre la RPDC escogida por la administracion Trump consiste en primer lugar en ejercer la sancion y presion superintensas en cooperacion con alguien; en el segundo, en emplazar permanentemente en el suelo surcoreano las armas nucleares tacticas; en el tercero, en emprender la accion militar independiente con vistas a la "operacion de descabezamiento" y el "golpe preventivo" contra la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					De hecho, la administracion Trump ejecuto el dia 6 el sorpresivo ataque con misiles cruceros contra Siria y lo anuncia como "mensaje de fuerte advertencia" a la RPDC comenzando asi a amenazarla y chantajearla abiertamente. 
					
					Ahora, los secretarios de Estado y Defensa y otros funcionarios de seguridad de EE.UU. no se cansan de reclamar la accion militar independiente contra la RPDC. 
					
					Ya que el fanatismo de provocacion militar del ejecutivo norteamericano llega a la etapa tan peligrosa que no se puede estar con brazos cruzados, el Estado Mayor General del EPC vuelve a declarar, bajo la autorizacion, la posicion de principios de la RPDC. 
					
					1. Frustraremos tajantemente con la reaccion superintransigente de nuestros militares y habitantes todas las bandidescas provocaciones politicas, economicas y militares que se deriven de la politica hostil anti-RPDC de Estados Unidos.
					
					2. Nuestra reaccion superintransigente frente a EE.UU. y sus satelites se dara sin piedad tomando como su meta el castigo destructivo que no tolerara la supervivencia.
					
					3. En cuanto a la grave situacion dada, EE.UU. debera escoger con sano juicio una opcion correcta para la solucion del problema.
					
					En lo adelante tambien, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos se enfrentaran sin vacilacion alguna con los que traten de infringir la dignidad y soberania del pais y frustraran siempre sin piedad con la reaccion superintransigente al estilo coreano todas las opciones provocativas de EE.UU.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con adeptos a la idea Juche
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con adeptos a la idea Juche 
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 14 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el director general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, Ramon Jimenez Lopez, el secretario general del IIIJ, Kenichi Ogami,  los jefes de delegaciones y los delegados de las organizaciones de estudio de la idea Juche, que estan de visita en Corea para celebrar el Dia del Sol.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con visitantes italianos
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con visitantes italianos
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- El miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente, del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Su Yong, quien es presidente de la Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio el dia 14 con el secretario general de la Comision para los Asuntos Exteriores del Senado de Italia, Antonio Razzi, y su comitiva que realizan una visita a Corea con motivo del Dia del Sol.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con delegacion mexicana
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con delegacion mexicana
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, departio el dia 14 con la delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico, presidida por su dirigente nacional Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, que realiza una visita a la RPDC con motivo del Dia del Sol.

articles.title: Portavoz del Comite de Juristas reclama castigo a EE.UU. por el ataque a Siria
articles.content:
Portavoz del Comite de Juristas reclama castigo a EE.UU. por el ataque a Siria
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- En una declaracion publicada este viernes, el portavoz del Comite de Juristas de Corea denuncia el ataque militar de EE.UU. contra Siria como evidente acto de agresion y crimen de guerra que merece el castigo en virtud del derecho internacional. 
					El pasado dia 7, EE.UU. cometio con muchos misiles el ataque contra una base aerea de las fuerzas gubernamentales de Siria difundiendo el rumor de que estas usaron el arma quimica, recuerda el portavoz y continua:
					
					No se puede perdonar nunca ese ataque que corresponde al acto de agresion y crimen de guerra, estipulados por la resolucion sobre el concepto de agresion, aprobada por la Asamblea General de la ONU, el Tratado de Paris sobre la renuncia de guerra y el Tribunal Militar Internacional de Nuremberg. 
					
					EE.UU. propuso y firmo primero el tratado sobre la renuncia de guerra y habla mas que nadie de la "observacion de la resolucion".
					
					Pero, malemplea la agresion y guerra como medios de su politica estatal en desprecio al derecho internacional y ataca asi con misiles a los paises desagradables violando flagrantemente la soberania de ellos.
					
					La sociedad internacional debe dar el castigo merecido a EE.UU., perturbador y destructor de la paz, sin tolerar nunca el presente caso de ataque armado contra Siria.
